entry.title: RT pbillingsby: The Lilypad module creator program feels like an important part of the shift away from the restraints of centralized AI services. You ...
entry.summary: RTâ€‚pbillingsby The Lilypad module creator program feels like an important part of the shift away from the restraints of centralized AI services. You can now create & deploy LLMs & other programs to the @Lilypad_Tech serverless & global GPU network using a straightforward Docker-based approach. Find out more about the program: https://blog.lilypadnetwork.org/lilypad-module-creator-rewards-beta
